info.title: ConvertKit
info.description: ConvertKit is the go-to marketing hub for creators that helps you grow and monetize your audience with ease. Convert your followers from social media, YouTube, and more to your email list with a beautiful landing page and opt-in templates.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all the forms for your account.

post.description: Subscribe an email address to one of your forms.

get.description: Retrieves a list of subscriptions to a form including subscriber data.
Retrieves a list of sequences for the account.

post.description: Subscribe an email address to one of your sequences.

get.description: Retrieves subscriptions to a sequence including subscriber data.
Retrieves a list of tags for the account.

post.description: Tags are handled as subscriptions. Subscribe an email address to a tag to have that tag applied to the subscriber with that email address.

delete.description: Removes a tag from a subscriber.

post.summary: Remove tag from subscriber by email
post.description: Remove a tag from a subscriber by email address.

get.description: Retrieves a list of subscriptions to a tag including subscriber data.
Returns a list of your subscribers. For unsubscribes only, use the cancelled at value for sort field param (currently the only supported extra sort field).

put.description: Updates the information for a single subscriber.
Unsubscribe a subscriber from all your forms and sequences.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all the tags for a subscriber.
Retrieves a list of all the broadcasts for your account.

post.description: Create a draft or scheduled broadcast. You can create a draft broadcast without any attributes. Scheduled broadcasts at a minimum should contain a subject line and your content.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL address for the thumbnail.
thumbnail_url.title: Thumbnail URL

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific broadcast, including draft, scheduled, and previously-sent broadcasts.

put.description: Updates the attributes of a specific broadcast. Broadcasts that are currently sending or that have been sent may not be updated.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL address for the thumbnail.
thumbnail_url.title: Thumbnail URL

delete.description: Permanently delete a draft or scheduled broadcast record. Broadcasts that are currently sending or that have been sent may not be deleted.

get.description: Retrieves the statistics (recipient count, open rate, click rate, unsubscribe count, total clicks, status, and send progress) for a specific broadcast.
Retrieve a list of all purchases for an account.
Retrieve a specific purchase by ID.
